DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety treatment effect 50 mg MK0822 Vitamin D v placebo Vitamin D postmenopausal woman low bone density .
DOC.brief_title: BMD Efficacy Safety Odanacatib Postmenopausal Women ( 0822-031 )
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal 3 year , tscore < =1.5 > 3.5 , hip contain hardware orthopedic procedure , ambulatory Patient previous hip fracture Patient > 1 prior clinical vertebral fracture AND candidate osteoporosis therapy Patient treat oral bisphosphonates , strontium , PTH agent effect bone Patient metabolic bone disorder osteoporosis Patient renal stone , Parkinson 's disease , MS active parathyroid disease .
